top_failure_modes.risk: Copy implies certifications, awards, or metrics that are unverified.
top_failure_modes.mitigation: No numbers/certs/awards; use placeholders like [PROOF ITEM].

top_failure_modes.risk: Demo could be mistaken for official or use protected branding.
top_failure_modes.mitigation: Mark DEMO; no logos; include DRAFT watermark in outputs.

top_failure_modes.name: scope_drift_to_outreach
top_failure_modes.risk: Operator or user tries to send/publish.
top_failure_modes.mitigation: Tool matrix blocks send/deploy; scope excludes outreach/deploy.
